fact_text: On this day in 1968, the Apollo 8 mission became the first crewed spacecraft to successfully orbit the Moon and return to Earth safely. Astronauts Frank Borman, Jim Lovell, and William Anders captured the iconic 'Earthrise' photograph, forever changing humanity's perspective of our planet.

episode.title: Morning Drops #03 - Space Shift
episode.description: Gaia invites you to shift your mindset with a simple yet powerful reflection: What if we saw emptiness not as a void but as space to create? An energising and feel-good selection of tracks, the perfect way to ease into your day and set the tone for the week ahead.
songs: Willy J Healey - Woke Up Smiling
The Strokes - You Only Live Once

match_reason: The Apollo 8 mission's theme of shifting perspectives and seeing our world anew perfectly aligns with this episode's exploration of mindset shifts and viewing emptiness as opportunity. Both celebrate the power of changing how we see things.
